titleStmt.title: A vindication of the sincerity of the Protestant religion in the point of obedience to sovereignes opposed to the doctrine of rebellion authorised and practised by the Pope and the Jesuites in answer to a Jesuitical libel entituled Philanax anglicus / by Peter Du Moulin.
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Redmayne for John Crook,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
